title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not receive focus.
OB: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not receive focus.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, it should receive focus.
SR:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. 
2. Press the 'Tab' key to navigate and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
